title: Hexakill  - Rotating game mode Time of Day

embed.description: From the original clone-tastic One For All to the sand-strewn battlefield of Ascension, rotating game modes provide unique spins on the classic League formula. It's time to kick things off with the next game mode in the rotation: Hexakill: Twisted Treeline is now live!

body:
Hexakill Times available on Australia but not China, Japan, NA or EUW,? Why is there not a time schedule for the most popular servers in the world? When is this going to be available today in North America

RIOT POST below that is confusing:
Hexakill: Twisted Treeline is now available on these times:
•Friday: 11:00am - 3:00am AEST
•Saturday: 11:00am - 3:00am AEST
•Sunday 11:00am - 3:00am AEST

replies.body:
Times are per region and can vary, and OCE is different than other regions in terms of time. 

For NA, we're looking at 12PM PST, and a turn off on Monday at 4AM.
It starts in NA at 12PM PST.
That's 9 pm EST... way too late.
